dmca.title: Casino Vacations alleges infringement
dmca.body:
Gentlemen:

Following is a notice of copyright infringement.

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.americancasinoguide.com/arizona.shtml

2.	The pages that infringe our copyrighted work are: http://casino-magyck.com/usland-arizona.html http://www.knowyourcasino.com/arizona.php

3.	My name: [private]; [private]@aol.com

4.	Contact information for the infringing web sites is not known to me.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
 
[private] President
Casino Vacations
Publisher of American Casino Guide
